info.readme:
The Standard Website package installs a complete website that can be adapted to most standard website designs. It can also be useful as a prototype or starting point for further development.
It contains - Homepage (with rotating panels) - Standard Page (with secondary navigation) - Article List - Email Form - Google Map Integration - Flexible cross site Content Panels - Sitemap - Client Area - XSLT Search
REMEMBER TO VOTE FOR IT !!

GenericProperty.Name: Content Panels

Template.Name: Article List
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/Standard.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
<asp:Content ContentPlaceHolderID="contentContent" runat="server"> <umbraco:Macro Alias="ArticleList" runat="server"></umbraco:Macro>
</asp:Content>

Template.Name: Client Area
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
<asp:Content ContentPlaceHolderID="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server"> <umbraco:Macro Alias="ClientAreaRedirect" runat="server"></umbraco:Macro> </asp:Content>

Template.Name: ContentPanel
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
<asp:Content ContentPlaceHolderID="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server"> <umbraco:Item field="bodyText" runat="server"></umbraco:Item> </asp:Content>

Template.Name: Homepage
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/Master.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Template.Name: Master
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <umbraco:Item ID="Item1" Field="title" recursive='true' runat="server"></umbraco:Item>

Call Now

Template.Name: Search
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/Standard.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
<asp:Content ID="Content1" ContentPlaceHolderID="contentContent" runat="server"> <umbraco:Macro runat="server" Alias="XSLTsearch" macroAlias="XSLTsearch" source="-1" searchFields="title,@nodeName,keywords,description,bodyText,panelContent1,panelContent2,panelContent3" previewFields="panelContent3,panelContent2,panelContent1,bodyText,description" previewType="beginning" searchBoxLocation="none" resultsPerPage="5" previewChars="255" showPageRange="0" showOrdinals="0" showScores="0" showStats="1"> </umbraco:Macro> </asp:Content>

Template.Name: Standard
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/Master.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Stylesheet.Name: base-min
default

property.name: Umbraco fields shown in results preview
Display search box at TOP, BOTTOM, BOTH, or NONE
Display BEGINNING or CONTEXT of each result
Number of search results to display per page
Number of characters of preview text to display
Display search score for each result?
Display 'Searched X documents in Y seconds'?
